channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 16:05 Driven Alarm to the Chernihiv Oblast. Follow the subsequent messages.
item.description: 🟢 16:05 Driven Alarm to the Chernihiv Oblast. Follow the subsequent messages.#Chernihiv This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
